description:
For chilly early morning runs and brisk yoga studios, this super-soft top will help you stay that just right temperature. From the cozy crossover collar to the comfy thumb loops, the Strika II is much more than another long sleeve tee.

  • Dropped hemline offers a little extra coverage and plays well with a French tuck
  • Poly blend knit has a comfortable 4-way stretch and dries quickly
  • drirelease® lyocell wicks away moisture and has natural odour control
  • Thumb loops keeps the sleeves from riding up
  • Length is 65cm
name: Indyeva Strika II Long Sleeve Top - Women's
